body:
Comment 3 by **jani.rahkola**: 
The method name is viewed correctly, but any regex special characters are not escaped
from user input. Thus following happens:

(pprof) weblist rapala/editdistance.(*ACNode).LookupChild
Total: 694 samples
Unknown verb pattern 'ACNode' in regex; marked by <-- HERE in
m/rapala/editdistance.(*ACNode) <-- HERE .LookupChild/ at /home/jani/gopprof line
4671, <NM> line 1.
